comment: Represents a message in the conversation.

variables.name: PERSON_USER_OTHERS
variables.comment:
* Represents the remote user. *

* If possible, you are suggested to create a {@link Person} object that can identify * the remote user better, so that the underlying model could differentiate between * different remote users. * * @see Builder#Builder(Person)

methods.name: public void writeToParcel(Parcel parcel, int flags)
public Person getAuthor()
methods.comment: Returns the person that composed the message.

methods.name: public ZonedDateTime getReferenceTime()
methods.comment:
* Returns the reference time of the message, for example it could be the compose or send
         * time of this message.

methods.name: public CharSequence getText()
methods.comment: Returns the text of the message.

methods.name: public Bundle getExtras()
methods.comment:
* Returns the extended data related to this conversation action. * *

NOTE: Do not modify this bundle.

methodNames: public void writeToParcel(Parcel parcel, int flags)
